common.Text: Top-quality custom PC builds and components for gamers, designers, and professionals. Located in Riga, Latvia.

nav.Name: Custom PCs Built For Your Needs
nav.Info: We build top-performance custom PCs for gaming, content creation, and professional use with carefully selected quality components.
nav.Answer: We're dedicated to building the highest quality custom PCs with tested components and exceptional customer service.
nav.Text1: Our technicians hand-build every PC with attention to detail for optimal performance and reliability.
nav.Text2: We test each component individually before assembly to ensure maximum compatibility and stability.
nav.Text3: Every system undergoes rigorous testing including stress tests, temperature monitoring, and benchmarking.
nav.Text4: Our technical support team is available 24/7 to help with any questions or issues you might have.
nav.readyToBuild: Ready to Build Your Dream PC?
nav.customPcDesc: Whether you're a gamer, content creator, or professional, we'll help you design the perfect PC for your specific needs and budget.

about.subtitle: We are Latvia's premier custom PC builder, dedicated to crafting high-performance computers with quality components.
about.storyParagraph1: IvaPro began in 2018 when a group of tech enthusiasts decided to combine their passion for computers with professional expertise.
about.storyParagraph2: What started as a small workshop in Riga has grown into one of Latvia's most trusted custom PC businesses, serving gamers, content creators, and professionals.
about.storyParagraph3: Our dedication to quality and customer satisfaction remains at the core of everything we do.
about.qualityText: We use only premium components from trusted manufacturers to ensure reliability and performance.
about.expertiseText: Our team consists of certified technicians with years of experience in PC building and troubleshooting.
about.satisfactionText: We go above and beyond to ensure our customers are happy with their custom-built systems.
about.NoReviews: No reviews available at the moment
about.defaultReview: Great experience with IvaPro! My custom PC works perfectly and the team was incredibly helpful throughout the process.
about.ctaTitle: Ready to upgrade your computing experience?
about.ctaText: Whether you need a custom gaming PC, a workstation for content creation, or just an upgrade to your current system, we're here to help.

team.name: Alex Petrov
team.bio: Computer enthusiast with over 10 years of experience building custom PCs.

team.name: Laura Berzina
team.bio: Dedicated to ensuring every customer has an exceptional experience with IvaPro.

team.name: Martins Ozols
team.bio: Expert in troubleshooting and maintaining optimal PC performance.

milestones.title: IvaPro Founded
milestones.description: Started as a small workshop with a focus on custom gaming PCs.

milestones.title: 1,000th PC Built
milestones.description: Reached a major milestone with our 1,000th custom computer build.

milestones.title: New Website Launch
milestones.description: Introduced our new online PC configurator for easier custom builds.

components.name: Components
components.title: Computer Components
components.description: Browse our selection of high-quality computer components for your custom PC build. Select a category to see available products.
components.preConfiguredDesc: If you'd prefer not to select individual components, check out our pre-configured PCs or use our PC Builder tool.

peripherals.title: Computer Peripherals
peripherals.description: Enhance your computing experience with our premium peripherals. Select a category to see available products.
peripherals.buildingDesc: Looking to build a new PC or upgrade your existing one? Check out our components section or use our PC configurator.

peripheralDescriptions.keyboard: High-quality keyboards for computing and gaming
peripheralDescriptions.mouse: Ergonomic and precise computer mice with various features
peripheralDescriptions.monitor: High-resolution monitors for work and entertainment
peripheralDescriptions.headphones: Headphones with excellent sound quality and comfort
peripheralDescriptions.camera: High-quality webcams for video calls and streaming

peripheralDescriptions.mice: Ergonomic and precise computer mice with various features

peripheralDescriptions.webcams: High-quality webcams for video calls and streaming
peripheralDescriptions.printers: Reliable printers for document and photo printing
peripheralDescriptions.mousepad: Mouse pads for smooth and precise mouse movement
peripheralDescriptions.microphone: High-quality microphones for recording and streaming
peripheralDescriptions.other-peripherals: Other peripherals including gaming accessories and more
peripheralDescriptions.tablet: Tablets for portable computing and creative work

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: This Privacy Policy explains how IvaPro collects, uses, and protects your personal information when you use our services.

dataCollection.title: Information We Collect
dataCollection.content: We may collect the following types of information:
dataCollection.identityDataDesc: First name, last name, username, and other identifying information.
dataCollection.contactDataDesc: Email address, telephone number, billing and delivery address.
dataCollection.technicalDataDesc: IP address, browser type, device information, usage data.

dataUsage.title: How We Use Your Information
dataUsage.content: We use your information to provide our services, process payments, communicate with you, and improve your experience.

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access or disclosure.

dataRetention.title: Data Retention
dataRetention.content: We retain your information only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes for which it was collected.

legalRights.title: Your Legal Rights
legalRights.content: You have the right to access, correct, delete, restrict processing, and port your personal data.

changes.title: Changes to This Policy
changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: These Terms of Service govern your use of the IvaPro website and services. By accessing our site or using our services, you agree to these terms.

pricingPayment.priceChanges: Prices for our products are subject to change without notice. We reserve the right to modify or discontinue any product or service without notice.
pricingPayment.paymentRequired: Payment is required at the time of purchase. We accept credit cards, bank transfers, and other payment methods as specified at checkout.
pricingPayment.processing: Your payment information is processed securely through our payment processors. We do not store complete credit card information on our servers.

shipping.title: Shipping and Delivery
shipping.estimates: Shipping times are estimates and cannot be guaranteed. Delivery times may vary depending on your location and other factors.
shipping.responsibility: We are not responsible for delays in delivery due to customs processing or other factors outside our control.
shipping.accuracy: We make every effort to accurately display the colors and features of our products, but cannot guarantee that your computer monitor's display is accurate.

warranty.title: Warranty and Returns
warranty.manufacturer: Components carry the original manufacturer's warranty. Details specific to each component will be provided upon purchase.
warranty.customPc: Custom built PCs include a labor warranty of 2 years from the date of delivery.
warranty.returns: Products can be returned within 14 days of receipt if they are in original condition and packaging.
warranty.condition: Returned items must be in their original condition and packaging, with all accessories and documentation included.

intellectual.title: Intellectual Property
intellectual.content: All content on this website, including text, graphics, logos, images, and software, is the property of IvaPro and is protected by copyright and other intellectual property laws.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.limitation: IvaPro shall not be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages resulting from the use or inability to use our products or services.
liability.indirect: We are not responsible for any damage to your computer system or loss of data resulting from the download or use of materials from our website.

governing.title: Governing Law
governing.content: These terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of Latvia, without regard to its conflict of law provisions.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Changes will be effective immediately upon posting on this website.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.content: If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us

repairs.title: Repair Management
repairs.pageSubtitle: Professional repair services for your PC, laptop, and peripherals. Fast, reliable, and affordable.

repairs.issueDescription: Please provide as much detail as possible about the issue...
repairs.uploadImageText: Drag & drop an image, or click to browse
repairs.finalPricingNote: Final pricing may vary based on the actual issues found during diagnostics. We'll contact you with a detailed quote before proceeding.

diagnostics.name: PC Diagnostics & Troubleshooting
diagnostics.description: Complete computer diagnostics to identify hardware and software issues.

hardware-replacement.note: Bring your own parts and save on costs
